oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Confederate veteran John Hamilton Johnston and 3 younger men
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pvt. Johnston had served in Co. G, 2nd (Ashby's) Tenn. Cav. Regt. CSA, having enlisted at age 23 in Sweetwater, Tenn. on June 28, 1861. The three men with him, including at least one kinsman, are identified on back of cabinet card. Johnston spent most of 1862 detailed as a nurse. He was discharged for disability in October or November 1862.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Johnston, John Hamilton; Johnston, Walter; McKenzie, Frank; Hale, Charlie
